sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
obstructs a road or path
, zapre cesto ali pot, tako da ljudje ali vozila ne morejo mimo.

seg.quote: The crash obstructed the road for several hours.

sense.def:
To obstruct justice or progress
pomeni preprečevati uresničevanje pravice ali napredka.

seg.quote: It is a crime for the President to obstruct justice.
